definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The thermistor unbalanced bridge is widely used in temperature measuring circuits.
sentences.chinese: 不平衡电桥在热敏电阻测温电路中应用十分广泛。

sentences.english: Several fundamental characteristics and applications of the PTC thermistor are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了PTC热敏电阻的几种基本特性及其应用。

sentences.english: It was pointed out that the industrialization of thermosensitive fiber should be accelerated by technological renovation.
sentences.chinese: 指出应改进技术加速热敏纤维的产业化。

sentences.english: Thermal Printer A thermal printer uses heat elements to produce images on heat-sensitive paper .
sentences.chinese: 热敏式打印机全用热元素在热感应纸上产生图像。

sentences.english: Presents a method to measure the wind velocity with the thermistor as the velocity sensor.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种用球形热敏电阻测量气流速度的方法。

sentences.english: This kind of sensors is a highly promising one.
sentences.chinese: 镍膜热敏电阻是一种很有开发前景的感温元件。

sentences.english: The problem of large zero drift always exists in microwave power meters with thermistor.
sentences.chinese: 热敏电阻式微波功率计，一直存在零点漂移大的问题。

sentences.english: A thermistor operates an alarm lamp.
These advantages for uncooled infrared thermal detection material are very favorable.
sentences.chinese: 这些优点对于非制冷红外探测热敏材料是非常有利的。

sentences.english: One thermistor is exposed to the ambient temperature, the other is sealed.
sentences.chinese: 热敏电阻是一个暴露在环境温度，另一种是密封的。

sentences.english: In this paper, a hardware circuit is designed to test the property curve of thermistor .
sentences.chinese: 开发了测量热敏电阻温度特性曲线的硬件电路。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of acupoints moxibustion to treat postoperative patients with urine retention after accepting craniocerebral operation.
sentences.chinese: 观察腧穴热敏化艾灸治疗颅脑术后病人尿潴留的效果。

sentences.english: The resin can be possibly applied in the heat-sensitive system.
sentences.chinese: 该树脂有望在水显影热敏树脂体系中得到应用。

sentences.english: A thermistor operates an alarm lamp .
In this paper, the developing property of photo-heat sensitive microcapsules was studied.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究光热敏微胶囊信息记录材料的热显影特性。

sentences.english: We make the best thermistors in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们生产世界上最好的热敏电阻传感器。

definition: solder mask (applied to a circuit board)
